announcements.title: AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Available for Public Preview
announcements.blurb: Recently, AWS announced the public preview of the AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry, a secure, production-ready,  AWS-supported distribution of the OpenTelemetry project. With the AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry, developers  can instrument their applications in one go to send correlated metrics and traces to multiple monitoring  solutions.

announcements.title: Public Preview: AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry
announcements.blurb: Today we are launching a preview of AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry. We are part of the Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF)’s OpenTelemetry community, working to define an open standard for the collection of distributed traces and metrics.

announcements.title: Announcing AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry in Preview
announcements.blurb: Today, we are announcing the availability in preview of AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry, a secure, production-ready, AWS-supported distribution of the OpenTelemetry project.

announcements.title: OpenTelemetry announces its Tracing Specification Release Candidate
announcements.blurb: Today marks another milestone in the journey towards OpenTelemetry’s first GA release. The tracing spec is now frozen and considered to be a release candidate.
